subject: Fwd: Testing private methods
msgSnippet: FYI.  An article that may be of interest to those bent on explicitly testing private things. Mike
messageBody:
FYI. An article that may be of interest to those bent on explicitly
testing private things.

Mike

> I'm sending this to you, because I'm having problems with Yahoo!

> current e-mail is not registered address and it's not acknowledging
> what I
> think my birthday is), so:
>

> addresses

> that
> would answer several recent threads.

>
